attributes.action: work to end the practice of Child Labour in Commonwealth Countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the Students of Saint John Houghton Catholic School Ilkeston, would like you our Prime Minister to use your influence within the Commonwealth to help put an end to Child Labour.
The majority of Children enslaved to work or forced to become child soldiers  without basic education or Human Rights are living in nations that are members of the Commonwealth such as India and Africa.  We believe that this practice is unacceptable in the 21st century. Every Child Matters and we as a global community believe that the Rights of the Child must be protected.
